plot: Gun Kyoma is an extremely fast 17-year-old bike racer. He must pair up with his rival and new high school classmate, Hijiri Hideyoshi, to compete in an endurance race at Suzuka International Racing Course.
opening_theme: "Shōnen no Saigo no Natsu (少年の最後の夏)" by Yoko Oginome
ending_theme: "Slope ni Tenkiame (スロープに天気雨)" by Yoko Oginome
